snippet: The statement contradicts earlier denials and raises question about President Thein Sein’s control over the army.
abstract: Myanmar admits that to using airstrikes to attack ethnic Kachin rebels near border with China, development that United States says is an extremely troubling escalation of conflict; admission contradicts earlier denials and raises question about President Thein Sein’s control over the army.
lead_paragraph: The statement contradicts earlier denials and raises question about President Thein Sein’s control over the army.

headline.seo: Myanmar Military Admits Air Raids on Kachin Rebels
headline.main: Myanmar Military Admits to Airstrikes on Kachin Rebels
headline.print_headline: Myanmar Military Admits to Airstrikes on Kachin Rebels
